I am trying to use Cantera (Cantera-1.7.0-src.zip using VC7) with
Fortran90=
 on Windows XP using Salfords Plato compiler. I have built
the .msi install=
er using visual studio. However it does not seem like
Fortran gets installe=
d in c:\cantera\. The source contains the Fortran
files, but they do not ge=
t transferred to the final folders. How do I
set the build to include the F=
ortran files?

I have tried to compile the Fortran files in the source and =
then
moving the resulting cantera.mod to the folder with the .f90 template
=
in the source (\..\tools\templates\f90\demo.f90) and then running the
demo.=
f90. However, there is a call to a missing routine
"ctfunc_importphase" whi=
ch crashes the program. 

Any idea how to fix this thing?
Anders
